hope for half life "more than 2 but less than 4"

So i never played a half life game before this one.
I bought half life 1 and 2 and the two half life 2 episodes in sale.
And i gotta say : it was totally worth it
Half life 2 is a action packed game with puzzles and some platforming.
I like the alien design of the gunships and synths of the combine.
I also found the creepy atmosphere of ravenholm really cool.
So great game i liked it
